TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Atom10FeedFormatter extends System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter implements class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable

Docs.summary: A class that serializes a instance to and from Atom 1.0 format.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and to create instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> from XML documents that represent Atom1.0 feeds. If you have derived a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and want to serialize it, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter%601> formatter.
> [!NOTE] > The Atom 1.0 specification allows for fractional seconds to be specified in any of its date constructs. When serializing and deserializing, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/indigo2-md.md)] implementation ignores the fractional seconds.
## Examples The following code shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and serialize it to Atom 1.0.
[!code-vb[AtomFormatter#0](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.servicemodel.sy_14_1.vb)] [!code-cs[AtomFormatter#0](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.sy_14_1.cs)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance is not automatically associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter> used to create it.

Docs.summary: The instance derived from that is associated with the instance.
Docs.value: The instance derived from that is associated with the instance.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
Docs.value: A value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value of this property is `true`. Attribute extensions are XML attributes that are not defined in the Atom 1.0 specification. This property determines whether to write these attributes during serialization. Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown attributes inside the `AttributeExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance when deserializing an Atom1.0 feed.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
Docs.value: A value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value of this property is `true`. Element extensions are XML elements that are not defined in the Atom 1.0 specification. This property determines whether to write these elements during serialization. Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown elements inside the `ElementExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance when deserializing an Atom1.0 feed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem ReadItem(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader, class System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed feed) cil managed

Docs.param: The used to create the new instance.
Docs.summary: Reads a syndication item from instance using the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method does not add the newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>, because this is done by the caller of the method. This method provides an extensibility point for classes derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter> to customize how an Atom 1.0 entry is deserialized.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> ReadItems (System.Xml.XmlReader reader, System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed feed, out bool areAllItemsRead);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> ReadItems(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader, class System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed feed, bool areAllItemsRead) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance to use to create the instances.
A value that specifies whether all of the instances have been read from the instance.
Docs.summary: Reads in a collection of instances from the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method does not add the newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instances to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>, because this is done by the caller of the method. This method provides an extensibility point for classes derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter> to customize how the Atom entries get deserialized. For instance, derived classes could delay the reading of the Atom entry until the caller accesses the entry.
